name: Swarm Shot
description:
This is a game created for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam.
Submitting this a bit early in case there are issues later.

The jam theme is (as many of you will know) "Out of Control".
I chose to implement that by making the direction of the bullets as hectic as possible by implementing a flocking AI, so the rounds fly around the base and target enemies, but them hitting isnt reliable.

Feel free to let me know what you think, I plan on updating to add more sounds and a more interesting UI theme before the jam ends.
